TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToBase64Transform extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
type ToBase64Transform = class interface ICryptoTransform interface IDisposable

span.span: Converts a to base 64.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Base 64 內容轉移編碼表示任意的位元序列的形式，不是人類可讀取。Base 64 Content-Transfer-Encoding represents arbitrary bit sequences in a form that is not human readable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的成員類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether multiple blocks can be transformed.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether multiple blocks can be transformed.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目前的實作中，只有一個區塊可讓此屬性一律會是一次轉換`false`。In the current implementation, only one block can be transformed at a time, so this property is always `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以確認可以轉換多個區塊。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to verify that multiple blocks can be transformed. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是簡單呼叫。This method is a simple call to . 呼叫`Dispose`允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關`Dispose`，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法來釋放未使用的資源目前的轉換。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to free up unused resources by the current transform. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 會透過將處置設定為 `Dispose` 而叫用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Gets the input block size.

value.span: 輸入資料區塊的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size of the input data blocks in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此轉換的輸入的區塊的大小是 3 個位元組。The input block size for this transformation is 3 bytes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫屬性，以擷取目前的轉換的輸入的區塊的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property to retrieve the input block size of the current transform. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets the output block size.

value.span: 輸出資料區塊的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size of the output data blocks in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此轉換的輸出區塊的大小是 4 個位元組。The output block size for this transformation is 4 bytes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫屬性以建立新的位元組陣列大小的輸出區塊的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property to create a new byte array with the size of the output block size. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Converts the specified region of the input byte array to base 64 and copies the result to the specified region of the output byte array.

span.span: Converts the specified region of the input byte array to base 64 and copies the result to the specified region of the output byte array.
The number of bytes written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一種區塊演算法，以處理輸入的區塊的 3 個位元組，並建立 4 個位元組輸出區塊。The class is a block algorithm that processes input blocks of 3 bytes and creates output blocks of 4 bytes. 方法將 24 位元的輸入的區塊轉換成字元資料的 32 位元。The method transforms an input block of 24 bits into 32 bits of character data. 您必須維護 3 位元組輸入的界限 4 位元組輸出界限，才能符合區塊轉換。You must maintain 3 byte input boundaries to 4 byte output boundaries in order to match the block transform. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法來逐一查看`inputBytes`轉換`blockSize`。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to iterate through `inputBytes` transforming by `blockSize`. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
